job_details.Vacaturetitel: Software Development Engineer, AWS Telecoms Prototyping
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As a Telecommunications Software Development Engineer, you will:
     * Design, develop, test and deploy well-architected software
     * Feel a real sense of achievement from completing and delivering projects in less time than you thought possible.
     * Get hands-on with a range of technologies and practice a range of disciplines: back-end, front-end, networking, DevOps, machine learning, data science, data architecture. We are curious generalists who don't pigeon-hole ourselves as particular "flavors" of engineer and never say "that's not my job".
     * Collaborate with customers through full engagements; you'll learn about their business challenges, rapidly design and develop prototypes to solve them, showcase the functionality you've written in demos and finally see the difference you've made when customers deploy solutions into their production environments.
     * Work with the latest AWS services and open-source technologies to build your prototypes. You'll always be encouraged to pick the right tools for the job.

   About the team
   We are a team of problem-solvers and builders who work on our customer's challenges that don't have cookie-cutter solutions. We work with the latest 5G and GenAI technologies and partner with leaders in these spaces. We often don't have the answers right away, and are expected to Dive Deep to figure out the best approach. The code we write provides immediate value for customers by showing how technology can solve their problems. #BDSI_AIP
job_details.full_text:
Software Development Engineer, AWS Telecoms Prototyping

As a Telecommunications Software Development Engineer, you will:
     * Design, develop, test and deploy well-architected software
     * Feel a real sense of achievement from completing and delivering projects in less time than you thought possible.
     * Get hands-on with a range of technologies and practice a range of disciplines: back-end, front-end, networking, DevOps, machine learning, data science, data architecture. We are curious generalists who don't pigeon-hole ourselves as particular "flavors" of engineer and never say "that's not my job".
     * Collaborate with customers through full engagements; you'll learn about their business challenges, rapidly design and develop prototypes to solve them, showcase the functionality you've written in demos and finally see the difference you've made when customers deploy solutions into their production environments.
     * Work with the latest AWS services and open-source technologies to build your prototypes. You'll always be encouraged to pick the right tools for the job.

   About the team
   We are a team of problem-solvers and builders who work on our customer's challenges that don't have cookie-cutter solutions. We work with the latest 5G and GenAI technologies and partner with leaders in these spaces. We often don't have the answers right away, and are expected to Dive Deep to figure out the best approach. The code we write provides immediate value for customers by showing how technology can solve their problems. #BDSI_AIP

profile_classification.rationale: The job description mentions 'machine learning' and 'GenAI technologies' but focuses heavily on general software development, prototyping, and customer engagement across a broad range of disciplines. It lacks specific details on core AI/ML tasks like model training, fine-tuning, or advanced generative model development, making it difficult to classify as a specialized AI role.

phrases: Design, develop, test and deploy well-architected software
back-end, front-end, networking, DevOps, machine learning, data science, data architecture
rapidly design and develop prototypes to solve them
showcase the functionality you've written in demos
The code we write provides immediate value for customers by showing how technology can solve their problems.
job_tasks.justification: The job explicitly states designing, developing, testing, and deploying software, and mentions various engineering disciplines including back-end, front-end, and DevOps, which are core to software development. The emphasis on rapid prototyping and showcasing functionality further aligns with software development practices.

phrases: see the difference you've made when customers deploy solutions into their production environments.
work on our customer's challenges that don't have cookie-cutter solutions.
job_tasks.justification: The role requires understanding customer business challenges and developing solutions to address them, indicating a need to align technical work with business needs and customer problems.
The job description explicitly lists 'DevOps' as one of the disciplines the engineer will practice, which falls under Operations Engineering.
The job mentions 'machine learning', 'data science', and 'GenAI technologies' as areas of practice, which are related to modeling, although the depth of involvement is not specified.

mentions: showcase the functionality you've written in demos
We are curious generalists who don't pigeon-hole ourselves
pick the right tools for the job
Dive Deep to figure out the best approach
customer's challenges that don't have cookie-cutter solutions
Dive Deep to figure out the best approach
pick the right tools for the job
